original_text: It causes the water to become as hard as stone. The water of the sea also becomes ice. It causes the water to become as hard as stone. The water of the sea also becomes ice. It causes the water to become as hard as stone. The water of the sea also becomes ice. It causes the water to become as hard as stone.
korean_text: 물은 돌 같이 굳어지고 깊은 바다의 수면은 얼어붙느니라

sentences.original_text: It causes the water to become as hard as stone.
The water of the sea also becomes ice.
It causes the water to become as hard as stone.
The water of the sea also becomes ice.

The water of the sea also becomes ice.
It causes the water to become as hard as stone.
